span.p: TF Lock Frozen\nmissing s3:DeleteObject\nCI pipeline stuck

div.style: color: rgb(254, 205, 211) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
color: rgb(254, 205, 211) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Connection Pool OOM\nNo PgBouncer ‚Äî direct conn\nexhaust Postgres max_connections

div.style: color: rgb(253, 230, 138) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
color: rgb(253, 230, 138) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: PITR Restore\nkubectl cnpg backup\nrestore from Barman

div.style: color: rgb(253, 230, 138) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Rotate Egress IPs\nupdate floating IP\nfix CiliumNetworkPolicy

div.style: color: rgb(253, 230, 138) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Fix IAM Policy\nadd s3:DeleteObject to CI\nfor tflock object ARN

div.style: color: rgb(253, 230, 138) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Disable Embedded ArgoCD\nargo-cd.enabled: false\nin devtron values
